sourcesContent:
import { Component, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { Donut } from '../../models/donut.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-donut-form', templateUrl: './donut-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./donut-form.component.scss'] }) export class DonutFormComponent { icons:string[]=[ 'caramel-swirl', 'glazed-fudge', 'just-chovolate', 'sour-supreme', 'strawberry-glaze', 'vanilla-sundae', ] @Output() creat = new EventEmitter() handleSubmit(form: NgForm){ if(form.valid){ console.log(form.value) }else{ console.log('is invalid'); form.form.markAllAsTouched() } } }
Name:

name is required

name should be more than 5 character

Icon:

icon is required

Price:

price is required

promo:

None

New

Limited

Descroption:

description is required

valid: {{ form.valid }} submitted: {{ form.submitted }}
Working .... 
    {{ form.form.value | json }}
